Types of Animation

Type Description Examples
2D Animation Traditional frame-by-frame animation or vector-based movements. Cartoons like "Tom and Jerry"
3D Animation Animation created in a three-dimensional space. Movies like "Toy Story"
Motion Graphics Text and graphical elements brought to life. Explainer videos, title sequences
Stop Motion Objects moved in small increments between individually photographed frames. "Wallace and Gromit"
